summary: I am a Product Manager looking forward to a new challenge within a well-established organisation and team. With over three years of experience as a Product Manager, I bring expertise in sales, operations, account management, and running my own graphic design business. I have a Masters in Global Media and Communication, a Bachelor's in Computer Science, and advanced Graphic Design knowledge.

work.summary: Bluethumb is Australiaâ€™s largest online art marketplace with over 20,000 artists and 25+ Indigenous Art Centres.
highlights: Boosted onsite conversion rate through user research and engagement.
Designed and launched an onsite direct chat feature between artists and collectors, leading to higher engagement and increased sales.
Led the addition of framing options for artwork, contributing 15% to overall revenue.
Introduced self-shipping for top sellers, reducing delivery time from 5 days to 3 days and increasing loyalty.
Conceptualised The Podium, a secondary art sales platform for collectors.

work.summary: Led a team of seven during a time of rapid growth, providing account management to artists and collectors.
highlights: Scaled the sales team from 4 to 7 members.
Reimagined the artwork commissioning process for custom art orders, increasing custom orders.
Kept NPS score at the center of decision-making, improving the score from 55 to 70 by the end of 2019.
Organised fortnightly live webinars for artists, increasing engagement.

work.summary: Handled digital media, content creation, logistics, and feature testing as part of a small team.
highlights: Created content for social media and blogs.
Organised in-studio photography for established artists.
Handled logistics enquiries and managed the shipment of online orders.

work.summary: Ran a graphic design business, specialising in corporate branding and print designs.
highlights: Worked with major clients like Eco4US (USA), Eco Line Solutions (Australia), and Happiest Hour (Australia).
Proficient in Adobe Photoshop, CorelDraw, Illustrator, Figma, and Adobe AfterEffects.

additionalInfo.workingRights: I am an Indian citizen with both New Zealand and Australian permanent residency. Able to work full-time in New Zealand.
